Name: loudoun_2008_comp_plan_overlays
LayerDisplayName: Comprehensive Plan Overlays, Loudoun County, VA
Originator: Loudoun County, Virginia, Deparment of Planning
OriginatorSort: Loudoun County, Virginia, Deparment of Planning
Abstract: This feature class contains comprehensive plan overlays for all of Loudoun County.  The overlays identified are general in nature in meaning and serve to augment the planned land use of those areas by providing more specific uses within those areas.
FgdcText:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This feature class contains comprehensive plan overlays for all of Loudoun County.  The overlays identified are general in nature in meaning and serve to augment the planned land use of those areas by providing more specific uses within those areas.</abstract>
      <purpose>This purpose of this feature class is to reference comprehensive plan overlays in certain areas.  The data is used extensively by both the Department of Planning, Building and Development but is administered by the Department of Planning. See the Department of Planning for any amendments.</purpose>
      <supplinf>This data layer is updated when comprehensive plan amendments that contain overlays are adopted.  The most current layer is dated March 2007, as a result of departmental updates.  This layer utilizes town and county boundary information, from the Town feature class and County feature class.  

Data are stored in the corporate ArcSDE Geodatabase as a polygon feature class.  The coordinate system is Virginia State Plane (North), Zone 4501, datum NAD83 HARN (vertical datum, if applicable, NAVD88), US Survey foot units.</supplinf>
    </descript>

      <fees>Loudoun County distributes spatial data in ArcGIS coverage or shapefile format for the cost of reproduction. Countywide spatial datasets may be purchased for $21 per CD or $22 per DVD for up to 650 MB or 4.5 GB of data, respectively. There is a $10 surcharge to purchase countywide topography, and a $3 charge if the item is to be mailed. If the customer wants the data in DXF format and/or would like OMAGI to custom select specific geographic areas of the County, there is an additional $7 per 15 minute increment labor charge.  Select aerial imagery is also available.</fees>
    </stdorder>
